snippet: Staten Island yielded a grim postscript to the toll from Hurricane Sandy on Thursday, as search teams discovered more bodies where the storm’s giant wall of water had smashed its way through.
abstract: Search teams discover more victims of Hurricane Sandy on Staten Island, and it becomes clear that the borough took the brunt of damage from the storm; 19 of New York City's 40 casualties have been found on Staten Island.

byline.original: By JAMES BARRON, JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and KIRK SEMPLE

lead_paragraph: Staten Island yielded a grim postscript to the toll from Hurricane Sandy on Thursday, as search teams discovered more bodies where the storm’s giant wall of water had smashed its way through.

headline.seo: Staten Island Was Tragic Epicenter of New York City’s Storm Casualties
headline.main: Staten Island Was Tragic Epicenter of Storm’s Casualties
headline.print_headline: Staten Island Was Tragic Epicenter of Storm’s Casualties
